Armed conflict means boots on the ground across the globe and men and women in uniform in harm’s way.

We all want America to have success in resolving conflicts; but when tension decreases, the need for diplomacy increases. Ex. NK, China, Saudi Arabia, Yemen, Ukraine, Qatar. Abandoning diplomacy makes armed conflict more likely.

The non-partisan professionals of our diplomatic corps make America stronger. Secretary Tillerson’s statement is more proof that there is no strategic objective to the administration’s hollowing out of the State Department.http://bit.ly/2k8l6ju

All this to pass permanent tax cuts for corporations by adding $1.5 trillion to our national debt. We need a tax bill that’s fiscally responsible, helps grow our economy & prioritizes the middle class. This is NOT it.
Under #GOPTaxBill, homeowners in NH lose the ability to deduct property taxes – a real blow to middle-class families.
Work-study students at colleges & universities will see a steep tax increase which will make college even more unaffordable and discourage higher learning.
College graduates lose out – they’re no longer able to deduct interest on student loans. NH has one of the highest student loan burdens in the country. #GOPTaxBill will make it worse.
Seniors also get hurt – the #GOPTaxBill will result in a $25 billion cut to Medicare. Seniors have paid into this program their entire lives. They deserve better.

The #GOPTaxBill again tries to repeal parts of Obamacare which will raise healthcare costs. The American public have already made their voices loud & clear that they don’t want their healthcare repealed.
The #GOPTaxBill will force Granite State families & millions more across the nation who make less than $75K a year to pay MORE in taxes by 2027: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DOxIXxhXkAUdcRB.jpg …
THREAD: We need to simplify our tax code, help small biz & deliver real relief to the middle class. The #GOPTaxBill achieves none of that. Here’s why I’m opposed…
